title: Pork, apple and cider pie
description: This gorgeous pie plays on the wonderful affinity between pork and apples. The fruit gives a subtle sweetness to the cider-enriched gravy and the sage lends an aromatic note.Equipment and preparation: you will need a 1.2 litre/2lb 12oz pie dish and a pie funnel.
ingredients: 1 cooking apple, about 150g/5½oz, peeled, cored and sliced
2 eating apples, 225-250g/8-9oz in total, peeled, cored and sliced
